title: Classic Hungarian goulash
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '750g lean beef stewing steak, cubed', '1 large white onion, finely chopped', '5 tablespoons paprika', '4 beef stock cubes, divided', '4 fresh garlic cloves, crushed', '1 carton passata (about 300g)', '2 tins red kidney beans, drained (or chilli beans)', '1 pint water', '400ml water', '4 carrots, chopped', '200g pasta']
